SECRET.
OPERATIONS.
From :- General Plumer, Italy.
To :- C.I.G.G., War Office.
Despatched 10.45 p.m. 26.12.17
Received 10.0 a.m. 27.12.17.
0.154. 26th.
No change in situation, quiet day.
Two hostile bombing raids on one of our aerodromes were made by enemy, and on village in front area to-day. Damage slight. Our aeroplanes and anti-aircraft guns accounted for at least four enemy machines and possibly more. Our losses nil. Some additional enemy machines also claimed by Italians. Total not yet known. Raid was in retaliation for one of ours recently which caused many casualties by succesfully attacking a leave train.
